      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Dispatched when a display object is added to the display list.
      void DisplayObject.addAddedToStageHandler(EventHandler handler)
      Dispatched when a display object is added to the display list.
      void LoaderInfo.addCompleteHandler(EventHandler handler)
      Dispatched when data has loaded successfully.
      void Stage3D.addContext3dCreateHandler(EventHandler handler)
      Dispatched when a rendering context is created.
      void DisplayObject.addEnterFrameHandler(EventHandler handler)
      [broadcast event] Dispatched when the playhead is entering a new frame.
      void DisplayObject.addExitFrameHandler(EventHandler handler)
      [broadcast event] Dispatched when the playhead is entering a new frame.
      void DisplayObject.addFrameConstructedHandler(EventHandler handler)
      [broadcast event] Dispatched after the constructors of frame display objects have run but before frame scripts have run.
      void LoaderInfo.addInitHandler(EventHandler handler)
      Dispatched when the properties and methods of a loaded SWF file are accessible and ready for use.
      void Stage.addMouseLeaveHandler(EventHandler handler)
      Dispatched by the Stage object when the pointer moves out of the stage area.
      void LoaderInfo.addOpenHandler(EventHandler handler)
      Dispatched when a load operation starts.
      void DisplayObject.addRemovedFromStageHandler(EventHandler handler)
      Dispatched when a display object is about to be removed from the display list.
      void DisplayObject.addRemovedHandler(EventHandler handler)
      Dispatched when a display object is about to be removed from the display list.
      void DisplayObject.addRenderHandler(EventHandler handler)
      Dispatched when the display list is about to be updated and rendered.
      void Stage.addResizeHandler(EventHandler handler)
      Dispatched when the scaleMode property of the Stage object is set to StageScaleMode.NO_SCALE and the SWF file is resized.
      void LoaderInfo.addUnloadHandler(EventHandler handler)
      Dispatched by a LoaderInfo object whenever a loaded object is removed by using the unload() method of the Loader object, or when a second load is performed by the same Loader object and the original content is removed prior to the load beginning.

    • Uses of EventHandler in com.emitrom.flash4j.core.client.net.drm

      Methods in com.emitrom.flash4j.core.client.net.drm with parameters of type EventHandler 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DRMManager.addAuthenticationCompleteHandler(EventHandler handler)
      The DRMManager dispatches a DRMAuthenticationCompleteEvent object when the user is authenticated by the media rights server after a call to the authenticate() method.
      void DRMManager.addAuthenticationErrorHandler(EventHandler handler)
      The DRMManager dispatches a DRMAuthenticationErrorEvent object when the user is not authenticated by the media rights server after a call to the authenticate() method.
